item.title: README.MD
item.description: I am using this “Ramblings Repository” to document my experiments or research in different topics that are of interest to me. I do not promise that everything written here is the most correct, but it is correct to me at the time of writing it. If you want to discuss any of the topics in this repository you can message me on LinkedIn or Twitter using the links bellow. Key Value Name Dimitar Tomov Currently Senior Software Engineer @ Scalefocus From Burgas, Bulgaria Programming Languages Java, Kotlin Technical Interests Backend, Spring, Cloud, Architecture Design, Clean Code Interests Video Games, Movies, Cooking, Biking LinkedIn Dimitar Tomov Twitter @dimtomov Currently Reading About Kotlin for Backend development
item.content:
I am using this “Ramblings Repository” to document my experiments or research in different topics that are of interest to me. I do not promise that everything written here is the most correct, but it is correct to me at the time of writing it. If you want to discuss any of the topics in this repository you can message me on LinkedIn or Twitter using the links bellow.

Key Value
Name Dimitar Tomov
Currently Senior Software Engineer @ Scalefocus
From Burgas, Bulgaria
Programming Languages Java, Kotlin
Technical Interests Backend, Spring, Cloud, Architecture Design, Clean Code
Interests Video Games, Movies, Cooking, Biking
LinkedIn Dimitar Tomov
Twitter @dimtomov
Currently Reading About Kotlin for Backend development
